note.p: Newfoundland merchant and shipowner. Son of Robert Hugh Job, cotton broker, of Liverpool, and Sarah Job Job of Liverpool.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/2707/61/16); 1881 (RG11/3571/58/1)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 May 2018)
New York, passenger lists, 1820–1957 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 May 2018)
